bio.experienceSummary: I have been a caregiver for children for 7 years now! I started at the age of 15, full time babysitting one six and one 7-year-old. I learned a lot about teaching children problem solving, critical thinking, and creative thinking at this job. After that, I became a full time nanny to my nephew from the time he was born until he was 2 years old, only stopping since I moved away to college. I experienced everything from diaper changing, burping, bath time, tummy-time, rice cereal, walking, crawling... all the phases! While in college, I volunteered at two different church nurseries every Sunday, sometimes newborn room and some in the toddler room as well. This taught me about keeping young children's attention during lessons and how to navigate caring for multiple children at once. As a now college graduate, I know that COVID-19 has been hard on everyone, but especially parents. I would love to ease that burden by providing full time child care.

Hi! My name is Grace and I am a 28-year-old college graduate with years of experience as a full-time nanny! I have been a nanny in the past for 3 other families, with kids ranging in age from 5 days old to 13 years! Newborns and toddlers are my specialty; I always joke that I could change a diaper blindfolded at this point! I am very patient, easy-going, and empathetic so I am pretty good at diffusing temper tantrums and big feelings. My last family used to call me the baby whisperer, but I am comfortable with all ages. I am a non-smoker, never late, and always treat little ones with kindness!

description.displayText: Grace has been incredible with my kids. I have a very difficult 2 year old and I am always nervous leaving him. In addition to my two year old I have a 6 month old. Grace is in my top 3 of people I trust with my kids. (Me, my mom, Grace) my two year old absolutely loves her. She is always punctual. She is extremely dependable and she treats my kids with compassion and respect. My kids are always kept on their routines and in bed on time. You can tell when she is with the kids that she is totally comfortable and confident in what she is doing. I feel lucky to have her a part of my network for help. I would recommend her 100%.

bio.experienceSummary: No longer available. I am no longer accepting inquiries. Please do not message me. .

description.displayText: Sarah is a wonderful down to earth sweet soul. Sarah, has been a nanny for our 3 young boys for a few month. Our middle child has a ton of food allergies and she took the time to understand all of our child's needs. She plays so well with them and even does meal prep. I highly recommend Sarah!

Our middle child has a ton of food allergies and she took the time to understand all of our child's needs. She plays so well with them and even does meal prep. I highly recommend Sarah!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hello! My name is Avra. Originally from Chicago (living in 3+ overseas countries before 18) & the oldest of four, keeping up with all ages is something I genuinely enjoy. I became a full time nanny yr of college & moved to Atlanta after graduating with a Bachelor's in Child Psychology. I feel i'm too young to have kids right now, hence why I love being a nanny! 
I use a Montessori approach to childcare as I find it is the best way to foster independence, self-autonomy & critical thinking. I love fostering natural curiosity & intuition of children through child-led days to shape learning/play based activities. I strive to give children a safe space to think freely and critically. 

+ 10 yrs experience as a sitter.
+ 6 yrs experience as a nanny to children ages 2months-14 years.
+ 3 yrs experience as a camp counselor.
+ 3 yrs experience tutoring up-to 5th grade.
+ Re-certified in CPR & AED- May 2023 
References available upon request, please reach out with any questions!

description.displayText:
Avra has been a god sent for our family. Working from home with two small kids is no easy task, and we are so lucky to have found Avra to help with our girls. Primarily she looks after our (very picky/people selective) infant on a regular schedule, and they are great together. We love she is so experienced with small children there isn't much direction I need to give her because she already knows the ends & outs of caring for kids. 
She is always on time, professional and responsible. I would highly recommend her to any family looking for someone to care for their children.

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi! I'm Zoha. I love children and animals, and I'm excited to start my college journey soon. In my free time, I enjoy reading, baking, hanging with my cats, and being outdoors.

I have 4 years of childcare experience with babies, toddlers, and older children. I am reliable, patient, and kind, dedicated to creating a safe and comfortable environment for kids. I also have experience with household tasks which I can provide if needed, such as meal preparation, laundry, light housekeeping, and carpooling. I am comfortable with cats and dogs once I get to know them. I have reliable transportation and am up to date with vaccinations.

I am available for babysitting, including date nights and last-minute requests. While I prefer to be organized and notified in advance, I can typically accommodate urgent needs.

description.originalText: Very nice young lady. I hired her for permanent but she did not follow threw on the job and at last minute I had to find a sitter

bio.experienceSummary:
I'm a nurturing and experienced childcare provider with four years of experience caring for children of all ages. My passion for making a positive impact on young lives led me to this fulfilling career. I believe in creating a safe, stimulating, and nurturing environment where children can learn, grow, and thrive.

I am known for my patience, creativity, and friendly approach. My communication style with parents involves verbal updates at pickup, regular text or phone call updates, and following their preferred communication method. I am very comfortable enforcing household rules and ensuring a structured environment for the children in my care.

I enjoy engaging children in various activities, including music, creative arts, cooking, and baking. I also love playing games like hide-and-seek and building forts. I prioritize getting to know each child individually and building a strong, trusting relationship with them.

description.originalText: Took great care of my 1 and 8 year old. Would definitely have back anytime,

bio.experienceSummary: I am a full-time special educator. I have 4 years of professional certified teaching experience. I earned my bachelor's degree at The University of North Florida while playing division 1 softball. Needless to say, I am extremely active, love exercising, and the outdoors. I earned my M. Ed. from The University of Central Florida in Education and am currently pursuing my Ph. D. in Education as well (I am in the dissertation phase and hoping to graduate this year, YAY!). I am seeking part-time work to help fund my doctoral studies. I look forward to meeting you and your loved one!

Hi there! I am a very bubbly but also patient and reliable student at Georgia Tech. I've been a sitter for family and friends all throughout high school and now my years in college. I am also a certified medical assistant which encompasses the skills/responsibilities of a CNA and more. I can't wait to get started!

description.displayText: Ally has a very soft and gentle spirit. She was great with my infant and toddler son's they took to her easily. I will definitely hire Ally again.
description.originalText: Ally has a very soft and gentle spirit. She was great with my infant and toddler son's they took to her easily. I will definitely hire Ally again.

bio.experienceSummary: Hi I'm Lora. I have been babysitting and nannying for the past 18 years. I have taken care of infants up to age 15. I am CPR/First Aid Certified. I have experience working with children with Autism and other Developmental Disorders. I have worked as a substitute teacher in a preschool and daycare for the past 10 years caring for children ages 1-5. My favorite thing about taking care of children is watching them develop their own personalities.

I have 10 years of experience. I'm the oldest of 7 and taking care of children just flows through my blood. I can help with Light Housekeeping and Cooking/Meal Preparation, good with homework. And love keeping the kids involved , entertained and just overall enjoying themselves while I'm there.
